name: rapid7-insightcloudsec
label: Rapid7 InsightCloudSec
description: InsightCloudSec secures your public cloud environment from development to production with a modern, integrated, and automated approach. This connector facilitates automated operation such as retrieving resource related information.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the Rapid7 InsightCloudSec server URL for this connector to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: Specify an API Key for this connector to access the Rapid7 InsightCloudSec endpoint.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Select the checkbox to verify the server's SSL certificate. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Resource Details
operations.description: Get all of the details about a resource including its dependencies based on specified ID of resource.

operations.title: Run Resource Query
operations.description: Execute query and get resources details.

parameters.title: Badges
parameters.name: badges
parameters.description: Specify the list of key-value pairs for badges in JSON format.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list of key-value pairs for badges in JSON format.

parameters.title: Badge Filter Operator
parameters.name: badge_filter_operator
parameters.description:
Select the operator for evaluating multiple badges. Options are: "OR" or "AND".
OR
parameters.tooltip:
Select the operator for evaluating multiple badges. Options are: "OR" or "AND".
OR

parameters.title: Filters
parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Specify the the name and configuration for a filter in JSON format.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the the name and configuration for a filter in JSON format.

parameters.title: Insight
parameters.name: insight
parameters.description: Specify a union of the Insight's pack type and ID: pack-type:insight-id
parameters.tooltip: Specify a union of the Insight's pack type and ID: pack-type:insight-id

parameters.title: Scopes
parameters.name: scopes
parameters.description: Specify a CSV list of the Cloud Organization Resource ID(s) and/or Resource Group ID(s) to which to scope the query. Use the List Clouds endpoint to obtain Cloud Organization resource ID(s); use the List Resource Group Associations endpoint to obtain resource group ID(s).
parameters.tooltip: Specify a CSV list of the Cloud Organization Resource ID(s) and/or Resource Group ID(s) to which to scope the query. Use the List Clouds endpoint to obtain Cloud Organization resource ID(s); use the List Resource Group Associations endpoint to obtain resource group ID(s).

parameters.title: Selected Resource Type
parameters.name: selected_resource_type
parameters.description: The resource type that will be used to populate the response object. If no type is provided, counts of all resource types (in the user's current InsightCloudSec Organization) will be returned.
parameters.tooltip: The resource type that will be used to populate the response object. If no type is provided, counts of all resource types (in the user's current InsightCloudSec Organization) will be returned.

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Specify the attribute by which to sort the returned resources.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the attribute by which to sort the returned resources.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of resources returned if selected_resource_type is provided and resources match the provided criteria. The value can be between 1 and 1000.
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of resources returned if selected_resource_type is provided and resources match the provided criteria. The value can be between 1 and 1000.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip over before returning anything. It is highly recommended that cursor be used instead.
parameters.tooltip: The number of entries to skip over before returning anything. It is highly recommended that cursor be used instead.

operations.title: Get Resource Tags List
operations.description: Retrieves list of tags for a given id of the resource.
